definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Have you heard of the expression "painting in poetry and poetry in painting"?
sentences.chinese: 您聽說過“如詩如畫”這個說法嗎？

sentences.english: HIS beautiful little island contains some of the most picturesque scenery in England.
sentences.chinese: 他的斑斕小島蘊含一些最如詩如畫的景色在英格蘭。

sentences.english: Shuihui Garden was named after its numerous picturesque ponds.
sentences.chinese: 水繪園，以如詩如畫的水景得名。

sentences.english: We have our own rooms and it overlooks a picture perfect rice field.
sentences.chinese: 我們有各自的房間，還可以俯瞰如詩如畫的稻田。

sentences.english: Like touching a five-line music, but it reveals a tranquil beauty of the picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 像動人的五線樂譜，卻透着寧靜之美，如詩如畫。

sentences.english: Picturesque buttes and mesasdot the background landscape.
sentences.chinese: 在背景的景色中散步着如詩如畫的山巒。

sentences.english: It's lightness, elegant as poem and painting.
Mary has been a ski coach for over 20 years in her idyllic hometown.
sentences.chinese: 在如詩如畫的故鄉瑪麗做了20多年的滑雪教練。

definition: in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
water so clear you can see the bottom
lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
